content: The Iron Pellet is one of the Rare Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is rather specialised, useful for specific spell builds or when adopting a particular style, over some of the other Soaks, which are better for general use.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Iron_Pellet.md', within the main section titled 'Iron Pellet'.
The content is as follows:
The Iron Pellet is one of the Rare Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is rather specialised, useful for specific spell builds or when adopting a particular style, over some of the other Soaks, which are better for general use.
